item.title: Sorting Series (7): Non-Comparison Sorting - Counting, Bucket, Radix and the Range/Digit Tradeoff
item.description: Explain prerequisites, complexity, implementation details, and pitfalls of non-comparison sorts with multilingual examples for counting, bucket, and radix.
